brain-up.title: Brain Up
brain-up.description: Boost your cognitive skills with Brain Up! Features a collection of logic puzzles.

privacy_policy.intro: We respect your privacy. This policy explains how we handle your data in Brain Up.

sections.title: 1. Data Collection
sections.content: We DO NOT collect any personal information (PII). No account creation required.

sections.title: 2. Ads & Internet
sections.content: We use contextual ads only. Internet is required to load ads, but no tracking is performed.

sections.title: 3. Local Storage
sections.content: All game progress is saved locally on your device.

tots-adventure.title: Tots Adventure
tots-adventure.description: A magical journey designed for toddlers to provide a safe and enjoyable interactive experience.

privacy_policy.intro: Tots Adventure (‚Äúwe‚Äù, ‚Äúour‚Äù, or ‚Äúus‚Äù) is designed to provide a safe and enjoyable interactive experience for young children. We are committed to protecting the privacy of children and complying with Google Play‚Äôs Families Policy.

sections.title: 1. Information Collection
sections.content: We do not require account creation and do not collect personal information like names, emails, or precise location data.

sections.title: 2. Advertising & Analytics
sections.content: We use child-appropriate, contextual ads via Google AdMob. No interest-based tracking is performed. Limited non-personal data (device type, OS) may be used for app stability.

sections.title: 3. Children's Privacy
sections.content: Tots Adventure is intended for families. We do not knowingly collect personal data from children or allow users to share personal information.

sections.title: 4. Data Security
sections.content: We take reasonable steps to protect usage data. Since we do not collect personal data directly, security risks are minimized.

privacy_policy.contact: Developer: Saspo World Games | Email: infosaspoworld@gmail.com

Pillar Jump.title: Pillar Jump
Pillar Jump.description: Pillar Jump is a fun and educational 3D game where players jump across moving pillars by choosing the correct answers. Solve number sequences, alphabets, addition and subtraction puzzles, and identify shapes and colors while navigating a colorful world. It is a landscape based game

privacy_policy.intro: We respect your privacy. This policy explains how we handle your data in Pillar Jump.

sections.title: 1. Data Collection
sections.content: We DO NOT collect any personal information (PII). No account creation required.

sections.title: 2. Ads & Internet
sections.content: We use contextual ads only. Internet is required to load ads, but no tracking is performed.

sections.title: 3. Local Storage
sections.content: All game progress is saved locally on your device.
